name: Mickey Mouse
subtitle: Wayward Sorcerer
author: Nicholas Kole

additional_info.title: FAQ - Costs
additional_info.body:
Q: If I have 2 copies of Mickey Mouse – Wayward Sorcerer in play, will my Magic Broom – Bucket Brigade cost 1 {I} less or 2 {I} less?

A: Your Magic Broom will cost 2 {I} less, 1 {I} for each copy of Mickey Mouse – Wayward Sorcerer.

flavor_text: He always goes for the clean sweep.
rules_text: ANIMATE BROOM You pay 1 less to play Broom characters. CEASELESS WORKER Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.
